languages.text: "Да, {name}. Пару раз, когда напивалась... Мне тогда казалось, словно среди шепотов в моей голове звучит и ее голос. Он был такой печальный, такой ясный... Я не удерживалась и откликалась. Надеялась, что смогу дотянуться до нее... там".

traits.locale_text: "Да, {name}. Пару раз, когда перебрала с выпивкой... Мне тогда казалось, словно среди шепотов в моей голове звучит и ее голос. Он был такой печальный, такой ясный... Я не удерживалась и откликалась. Надеялась, что смогу дотянуться до нее... там".
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Yes, {name}. I did it a couple of times, when I'd had too much to drink... At the time, I thought I heard her voice among all the whispers in my head. The voice was so sad, so clear... I couldn't help myself — I answered. I hoped I could reach her... there."
languages.original_text: "Да, {name}. Пару раз, когда напивалась... Мне тогда казалось, словно среди шепотов в моей голове звучит и ее голос. Он был такой печальный, такой ясный... Я не удерживалась и откликалась. Надеялась, что смогу дотянуться до нее... там".

traits.locale_text: "Yes, {name}. I did it a couple of times, when I'd had too much to drink... At the time, I thought I heard her voice among all the whispers in my head. The voice was so sad, so clear... I couldn't help myself — I answered. I hoped I could reach her... there."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Yes, {name}. I did it a couple of times, when I'd had too much to drink... At the time, I thought I heard her voice among all the whispers in my head. The voice was so sad, so clear... I couldn't help myself — I answered. I hoped I could reach her... there."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Yes, {name}. I did it a couple of times, when I'd had too much to drink... At the time, I thought I heard her voice among all the whispers in my head. The voice was so sad, so clear... I couldn't help myself — I answered. I hoped I could reach her... there."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Yes, {name}. I did it a couple of times, when I'd had too much to drink... At the time, I thought I heard her voice among all the whispers in my head. The voice was so sad, so clear... I couldn't help myself — I answered. I hoped I could reach her... there."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: “是的，{name}。我喝多了的时候，曾经召唤过她好几次……那个时候，在我脑中那些耳语之中，我听到了她的声音。她的声音是如此悲伤，如此清晰……我没能控制住自己，回答了她的话。我希望我能见到她……在那里。”
languages.original_text: "Yes, {name}. I did it a couple of times, when I'd had too much to drink... At the time, I thought I heard her voice among all the whispers in my head. The voice was so sad, so clear... I couldn't help myself — I answered. I hoped I could reach her... there."

traits.locale_text: “是的，{name}。我喝多了的时候，曾经召唤过她好几次……那个时候，在我脑中那些耳语之中，我听到了她的声音。她的声音是如此悲伤，如此清晰……我没能控制住自己，回答了她的话。我希望我能见到她……在那里。”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: «Sí, {name}. Lo hice un par de veces, cuando había bebido de más... Entonces me pareció oír su voz entre los susurros de mi cabeza. Sonaba tan triste, tan clara... No pude contenerme y respondí. Pensé que podría encontrarla... allí».
languages.original_text: "Yes, {name}. I did it a couple of times, when I'd had too much to drink... At the time, I thought I heard her voice among all the whispers in my head. The voice was so sad, so clear... I couldn't help myself — I answered. I hoped I could reach her... there."

traits.locale_text: «Sí, {name}. Lo hice un par de veces, cuando había bebido de más... Entonces me pareció oír su voz entre los susurros de mi cabeza. Sonaba tan triste, tan clara... No pude contenerme y respondí. Pensé que podría encontrarla... allí».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: 「そうね、{name}様。飲み過ぎたとき、何度かやったわ…そのとき、頭の中の囁きに混じって、彼女の声が聞こえた気がしたの。その声はとても悲しく、とても澄んでいた…あたいはどうすることもできずに返事をしたわ。彼女と話せればと…」
languages.original_text: "Yes, {name}. I did it a couple of times, when I'd had too much to drink... At the time, I thought I heard her voice among all the whispers in my head. The voice was so sad, so clear... I couldn't help myself — I answered. I hoped I could reach her... there."

traits.locale_text: 「そうね、{name}様。飲み過ぎたとき、何度かやったわ…そのとき、頭の中の囁きに混じって、彼女の声が聞こえた気がしたの。その声はとても悲しく、とても澄んでいた…あたいはどうすることもできずに返事をしたわ。彼女と話せればと…」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Ja, {name}. Ich habe das einige Male gemacht, wenn ich zu viel getrunken hatte ... Ich dachte, ich würde ihre Stimme zwischen dem Flüstern in meinem Kopf hören. Die Stimme war so traurig, so klar ... Ich konnte nicht anders ... als ihr zu antworten. Ich hoffe, ich könnte sie dort ... erreichen."
languages.original_text: "Yes, {name}. I did it a couple of times, when I'd had too much to drink... At the time, I thought I heard her voice among all the whispers in my head. The voice was so sad, so clear... I couldn't help myself — I answered. I hoped I could reach her... there."

traits.locale_text: "Ja, {name}. Ich habe das einige Male gemacht, wenn ich zu viel getrunken hatte ... Ich dachte, ich würde ihre Stimme zwischen dem Flüstern in meinem Kopf hören. Die Stimme war so traurig, so klar ... Ich konnte nicht anders ... als ihr zu antworten. Ich hoffe, ich könnte sie dort ... erreichen."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: « Oui, {name}. C'est arrivé une ou deux fois, quand j'avais trop bu... Sur le moment, j'ai cru entendre sa voix parmi les nombreux murmures qui résonnent en permanence dans ma tête. Elle avait l'air si triste que je n'ai pas pu m'empêcher de répondre. J'espérais pouvoir l'atteindre... où qu'elle soit. »
languages.original_text: "Yes, {name}. I did it a couple of times, when I'd had too much to drink... At the time, I thought I heard her voice among all the whispers in my head. The voice was so sad, so clear... I couldn't help myself — I answered. I hoped I could reach her... there."

traits.locale_text: « Oui, {name}. C'est arrivé une ou deux fois, quand j'avais trop bu... Sur le moment, j'ai cru entendre sa voix parmi les nombreux murmures qui résonnent en permanence dans ma tête. Elle avait l'air si triste que je n'ai pas pu m'empêcher de répondre. J'espérais pouvoir l'atteindre... où qu'elle soit. »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Evet {name}. İçkiyi fazla kaçırınca birkaç kez onu çağırdım... O zamanlar kafamdaki seslerin arasında onu da duyduğumu düşünüyordum. Ses çok üzgündü, çok netti... Kendime engel olamayıp cevap verdim. Orada ona ulaşabileceğimi ümit ediyordum."
languages.original_text: "Yes, {name}. I did it a couple of times, when I'd had too much to drink... At the time, I thought I heard her voice among all the whispers in my head. The voice was so sad, so clear... I couldn't help myself — I answered. I hoped I could reach her... there."

traits.locale_text: "Evet {name}. İçkiyi fazla kaçırınca birkaç kez onu çağırdım... O zamanlar kafamdaki seslerin arasında onu da duyduğumu düşünüyordum. Ses çok üzgündü, çok netti... Kendime engel olamayıp cevap verdim. Orada ona ulaşabileceğimi ümit ediyordum."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion
